${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:StunningStrike.NAME: Stunning Strike
${modID}:StunningStrike.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magic. NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL ${modID}:Blood: Gain !M! Dexterity this turn.

${modID}:MagicWeapon.NAME: Magic Weapon
${modID}:MagicWeapon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Focus. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Focus. NL Your next Attack is ${modID}:Magic.

${modID}:FutureStrike.NAME: Future Strike
${modID}:FutureStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Blood: Scry equal to unBlocked damage.

${modID}:OpportunityAttack.NAME: Opportunity Attack
${modID}:OpportunityAttack.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Blood: Draw 1 card.

${modID}:MagicMissile.NAME: Magic Missile
${modID}:MagicMissile.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magic. NL Deal !D! damage. Twice as effective against Block.

${modID}:Bolt.NAME: Bolt
${modID}:Bolt.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Magic *Missile into your hand.
${modID}:Bolt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! [#7FFF00]Magic[] *Missiles into your hand.

${modID}:PowerUp.NAME: Power Up
${modID}:PowerUp.DESCRIPTION: Powers are free this turn. NL You can't gain Block from cards for 2 turns.

${modID}:KnowledgeIsPower.NAME: Knowledge is Power
${modID}:KnowledgeIsPower.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Adventitious. NL Whenever you draw cards, gain !M! Focus for that turn.

${modID}:Aetherflow.NAME: Aetherflow
${modID}:Aetherflow.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card for each *Aether channeled this combat.

${modID}:SteelwindStrike.NAME: Steelwind Strike
${modID}:SteelwindStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

${modID}:Starstorm.NAME: Starstorm
${modID}:Starstorm.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magic. NL Channel 3 ${modID}:Aether. NL At the start of your next turn, deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

${modID}:EidolonForm.NAME: Eidolon Form
${modID}:EidolonForm.DESCRIPTION: Adventitious. NL At the start of your turn, add 1 card from your draw pile to your hand. NL It becomes ${modID}:Spontaneous.
${modID}:EidolonForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Adventitious. NL Now and [#FFFFFF]at[] the start of your turn, add 1 card from your draw pile to your hand. NL It becomes ${modID}:Spontaneous.

${modID}:MartialAdept.NAME: Martial Adept
${modID}:MartialAdept.DESCRIPTION: For the rest of the turn, whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, draw !M! card.
${modID}:MartialAdept.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: For the rest of the turn, whenever you deal unBlocked attack damage, draw !M! cards.

${modID}:IronFist.NAME: Iron Fist
${modID}:IronFist.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Blood: Gain Block next turn equal to unBlocked damage.

${modID}:RegenerativeBreaking.NAME: Regenerative Breaking
${modID}:RegenerativeBreaking.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL You cannot play any more attacks this turn. NL ${modID}:Blood: Gain [E].

${modID}:SnapBack.NAME: Snap Back
${modID}:SnapBack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Put one card from your discard pile on top of your deck.

${modID}:ShockingGrasp.NAME: Shocking Grasp
${modID}:ShockingGrasp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Blood: Enemy loses !M! *Strength this turn.

${modID}:Spellstrike.NAME: Spellstrike
${modID}:Spellstrike.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magic. NL Deal !D! damage for each Aether channeled this combat.

${modID}:WitchBolt.NAME: Witch Bolt
${modID}:WitchBolt.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magic. NL Take 1 damage. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Blood: Put a copy of this card on top of your draw pile.

${modID}:Sunbeam.NAME: Sunbeam
${modID}:Sunbeam.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magic. NL Channel 1 ${modID}:Aether. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:ZephyrStrike.NAME: Zephyr Strike
${modID}:ZephyrStrike.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magic. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.

${modID}:Soulrend.NAME: Soulrend
${modID}:Soulrend.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magic. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Blood: Gain 1 extra orb slot.

${modID}:Earthquake.NAME: Earthquake
${modID}:Earthquake.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Twice as effective against Block.

${modID}:Quadrature.NAME: Quadrature
${modID}:Quadrature.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magic. NL Deal X damage to ALL enemies X times. Deal damage an additional time based on your Focus.

${modID}:Advantage.NAME: Advantage
${modID}:Advantage.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard 1 card.

${modID}:MindOverMatter.NAME: Mind over Matter
${modID}:MindOverMatter.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL Lose all *Strength. NL Gain *Focus equal to lost *Strength (positive or negative).

${modID}:Disengage.NAME: Disengage
${modID}:Disengage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain this Block an additional time for each enemy in combat.

${modID}:PurgeThought.NAME: Purge Thought
${modID}:PurgeThought.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 hit point. NL Exhaust 1 card. NL Gain *Focus equal to its cost.

${modID}:StepOfTheWind.NAME: Step of the Wind
${modID}:StepOfTheWind.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack this turn, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:FastCast.NAME: Fast Cast
${modID}:FastCast.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL Evoke your rightmost orb. NL Draw !M! card.
${modID}:FastCast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL Evoke your rightmost orb. NL Draw !M! cards.

${modID}:GuardianBlade.NAME: Guardian Blade
${modID}:GuardianBlade.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Your next Attack this turn is ${modID}:Magic.

${modID}:ActionSurge.NAME: Action Surge
${modID}:ActionSurge.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Can only be played if you have no energy. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ActionSurge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Can only be played if you have no energy. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Realize.NAME: Realize
${modID}:Realize.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Focus. NL Gain an additional orb slot.

${modID}:BonusAction.NAME: Bonus Action
${modID}:BonusAction.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL Put one ${modID}:Spontaneous card from your discard pile into your hand. NL It costs 1 less this turn. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:BonusAction.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL Put one ${modID}:Spontaneous card from your discard pile into your hand. NL It costs 1 less this combat. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Sanctuary.NAME: Sanctuary
${modID}:Sanctuary.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Can only be played if every card in your hand is a Skill.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have non-Skill cards in my hand.

${modID}:Multiattack.NAME: Multiattack
${modID}:Multiattack.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of all Attacks in your hand to 0 this turn.

${modID}:FeignDisaster.NAME: Feign Disaster
${modID}:FeignDisaster.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Blur. NL You cannot attack this turn.

${modID}:LightFromAbove.NAME: Light from Above
${modID}:LightFromAbove.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade one card in your hand for the rest of combat. NL If you have an empty orb slot, Channel 1 ${modID}:Aether.
${modID}:LightFromAbove.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of combat. NL If you have an empty orb slot, Channel 1 ${modID}:Aether.

${modID}:TakeCover.NAME: Take Cover
${modID}:TakeCover.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards.

${modID}:Enchant.NAME: Enchant
${modID}:Enchant.DESCRIPTION: Put an Attack from your discard pile onto the top of your draw pile. NL Make it ${modID}:Magic. NL If it was already *Magic, gain [E].
${modID}:Enchant.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put an Attack from your discard pile onto the top of your draw pile. NL Reduce its cost by 1 this combat. NL Make it ${modID}:Magic. NL If it was already *Magic, gain [E].

${modID}:Memorize.NAME: Memorize
${modID}:Memorize.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Scry !${modID}:scry!. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Permanently increase this card's Scry by 1. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Suppress.NAME: Suppress
${modID}:Suppress.DESCRIPTION: Spontaneous. NL Exhaust a card in your hand. NL Permanently remove it from your deck after combat. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Jailbreak.NAME: Jailbreak
${modID}:Jailbreak.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! Focus this turn. NL Draw cards equal to your Focus.

${modID}:GuidingLight.NAME: Guiding Light
${modID}:GuidingLight.DESCRIPTION: Each turn, retain cards up to the number of Aether orbs channeled this combat.

${modID}:Artillery.NAME: Artillery
${modID}:Artillery.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, lose 1 hit point and add a *Magic *Missile to your hand.
${modID}:Artillery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, lose 1 hit point and add a [#7FFF00]Magic[] *Missile+ to your hand.

${modID}:DefensiveStance.NAME: Defensive Stance
${modID}:DefensiveStance.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL Lose 2 Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity.
${modID}:DefensiveStance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL Lose 1 Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity.

${modID}:Fireproof.NAME: Fireproof
${modID}:Fireproof.DESCRIPTION: Take no damage from your own cards and orbs.

${modID}:Efficiency.NAME: Efficiency
${modID}:Efficiency.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, select !M! card. Reduce its cost by one this combat.

${modID}:ExploitWeakness.NAME: Exploit Weakness
${modID}:ExploitWeakness.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL ${modID}:Compensate: Double this card's damage this combat. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:EvadeCapture.NAME: Evade Capture
${modID}:EvadeCapture.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL ${modID}:Compensate: Double this card's Block this combat. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Spellslinger.NAME: Spellslinger
${modID}:Spellslinger.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL Unplayable. NL ${modID}:Compensate: Add 1 *Magic *Missile to your hand.
${modID}:Spellslinger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL Unplayable. NL ${modID}:Compensate: Add 2 [#7FFF00]Magic[] *Missiles to your hand.

${modID}:FieldTest.NAME: Field Test
${modID}:FieldTest.DESCRIPTION: Add a random card to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL You may add it to your deck after combat. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:FieldTest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add one of three random cards to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL You may add it to your deck after combat. NL Exhasut.

${modID}:Retune.NAME: Retune
${modID}:Retune.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Focus. NL You may add one of three random Blue cards to your deck after combat. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:MadScience.NAME: Mad Science
${modID}:MadScience.DESCRIPTION: Add 1 of 4 random cards from any color to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL You may add it to your deck after combat. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:RayOfEnfeeblement.NAME: Ray of Enfeeblement
${modID}:RayOfEnfeeblement.DESCRIPTION: The enemy gains !M! Weak and !M! Frail and loses !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BackStrike.NAME: Back Strike
${modID}:BackStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is Frail, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

${modID}:FaerieFire.NAME: Faerie Fire
${modID}:FaerieFire.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magic. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${modID}:Blood: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !M! Frail. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:NecroticBeam.NAME: Necrotic Beam
${modID}:NecroticBeam.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magic. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Double this damage if the enemy is Frail. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:MegaDebuff.NAME: Mega Debuff
${modID}:MegaDebuff.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Adventitious. NL Apply !M! Weak, !M! Vulnerable, and !M! Frail to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Pillage.NAME: Pillage
${modID}:Pillage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, gain !M! Regen. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:PhantasmalForce.NAME: Phantasmal Force
${modID}:PhantasmalForce.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magic. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Blood: Play an Attack from your discard pile for free and exhaust it.
${modID}:PhantasmalForce.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magic. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Blood: Play an Attack from your discard pile twice for free and exhaust it.

${modID}:BioRepair.NAME: Bio-Repair
${modID}:BioRepair.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL Gain !M! Regen. NL If you have any Regen at the end of combat, raise your Max HP by 1.

${modID}:Protection.NAME: Protection
${modID}:Protection.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Artifact. NL At the start of next turn, lose !M! Artifact.

${modID}:Warding.NAME: Warding
${modID}:Warding.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL At the start of your turn, gain !M! Artifact and "At the start of the next turn, lose !M! Artifact".
${modID}:Warding.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL Now and [#FFFFFF]at[] the start of your turn, gain !M! Artifact and "At the start of the next turn, lose !M! Artifact.".

${modID}:ArcaneSmite.NAME: Arcane Smite
${modID}:ArcaneSmite.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magic. NL Deal !D! damage X times. NL Lose 1 Orb slot. NL If you have no Orb slot to remove, Exhaust.

${modID}:ShadowStrike.NAME: Shadow Strike
${modID}:ShadowStrike.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magic. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Channel !M! Dark.

${modID}:Stoneskin.NAME: Stoneskin
${modID}:Stoneskin.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain one less [E] at the start of your next turn.

${modID}:VampiricTutor.NAME: Vampiric Tutor
${modID}:VampiricTutor.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Lose !M! max HP. NL Put a card from your draw pile into your hand.

${modID}:CircleBack.NAME: Circle Back
${modID}:CircleBack.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle all Powers in your discard pile into your draw pile. NL Scry equal to the number of powers shuffled this way. NL Draw 3 cards. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:CircleBack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle all Powers in your discard pile into your draw pile. NL Scry equal to the number of powers shuffled this way. NL Draw until your hand is full. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:PotentMagic.NAME: Potent Magic
${modID}:PotentMagic.DESCRIPTION: Each turn, your first ${modID}:Magic Attack benefits from Focus twice.
${modID}:PotentMagic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Each turn, your first !M! ${modID}:Magic Attacks benefits from Focus twice.

${modID}:BurningClarity.NAME: Burning Clarity
${modID}:BurningClarity.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP from a card or orb, gain !M! Focus.

${modID}:Divine.NAME: Divine
${modID}:Divine.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw one or more cards during your turn, first Scry !M!.

${modID}:OutwitFate.NAME: Outwit Fate
${modID}:OutwitFate.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you discard a card from your draw pile, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:UnarmedStrike.NAME: Unarmed Strike
${modID}:UnarmedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy doesn't intend to attack, deal !D! damage again.

${modID}:Bide.NAME: Bide
${modID}:Bide.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy doesn't intend to attack, gain !M! Focus.
${modID}:Bide.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL If the enemy doesn't intend to attack, gain !M! Focus.

${modID}:Surprise.NAME: Surprise
${modID}:Surprise.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL ${modID}:Compensate: Draw 1 card. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Draw an additional card for each enemy that doesn't intend to attack. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Fireball.NAME: Fireball
${modID}:Fireball.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magic. NL Channel !M! ${modID}:Flame. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Firewall.NAME: Firewall
${modID}:Firewall.DESCRIPTION: If you have an empty orb slot, Channel 1 ${modID}:Flame. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !M! damage for each ${modID}:FLame in your orb slots whenever you are attacked this turn.

${modID}:DelayedBlastFireball.NAME: Delayed Blast Fireball
${modID}:DelayedBlastFireball.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL If you have an empty orb slot, Channel 1 ${modID}:Flame. NL Increase the damage of all *Flame orbs.
${modID}:DelayedBlastFireball.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you have an empty orb slot, Channel 1 ${modID}:Flame. NL Increase the damage of all *Flame orbs.

${modID}:GreenFlameBlade.NAME: Green Flame Blade
${modID}:GreenFlameBlade.DESCRIPTION: If you have an empty orb slot, Channel 1 ${modID}:Flame. NL Your next Attack this turn has "${modID}:Blood: Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies."

${modID}:Riposte.NAME: Riposte
${modID}:Riposte.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you take no damage from an enemy, return this from the discard pile to your Hand.

${modID}:SelfDefense.NAME: Self-Defense
${modID}:SelfDefense.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you take damage from an enemy, return this from the discard pile to your Hand.

${modID}:Shield.NAME: Shield
${modID}:Shield.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you take no damage from an enemy, return this from the discard pile to your Hand.

${modID}:Rebuke.NAME: Rebuke
${modID}:Rebuke.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL Evoke your next Orb. NL Whenever you take damage from an enemy, return this from the discard pile to your Hand.
${modID}:Rebuke.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL Evoke your next Orb. NL Channel the Orb that was just Evoked. NL Whenever you take damage from an enemy, return this from the discard pile to your Hand.

${modID}:ConcealPower.NAME: Conceal Power
${modID}:ConcealPower.DESCRIPTION: Double your Block. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Entropy. NL Can only be played if every card in your hand is a Skill.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have non-Skill cards in my hand.

${modID}:Mitigation.NAME: Mitigation
${modID}:Mitigation.DESCRIPTION: For each enemy: NL If it intends to attack, apply 2 Weak. NL If it intends to debuff, apply 2 Vulnerable. NL If it intends to Block, apply 2 Frail. NL If it intends to buff, apply 1 ${modID}:Entropy.
${modID}:Mitigation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: For each enemy: NL If it intends to attack, apply 4 Weak. NL If it intends to debuff, apply 4 Vulnerable. NL If it intends to Block, apply 4 Frail. NL If it intends to buff, apply 2 ${modID}:Entropy.

${modID}:Counterspell.NAME: Counterspell
${modID}:Counterspell.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL If the enemy does not intend to attack, ${modID}:Stun it. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:PowerWordKill.NAME: Power Word: Kill
${modID}:PowerWordKill.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL If the enemy has !M! or less HP, set their HP to 0. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:PowerWordKill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. Nl ${modID}:Compensate: Draw 1 card. NL If the enemy has !M! or less HP, set their HP to 0. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Shillelagh.NAME: Shillelagh
${modID}:Shillelagh.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL This Attack is ${modID}:Magic unless your Strength is greater than your Focus.

${modID}:FocusedStrike.NAME: Focused Strike
${modID}:FocusedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Trigger the passive effect of each of your Orbs.

${modID}:Quickening.NAME: Quickening
${modID}:Quickening.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL If both of them are Skills, gain [E].
